title: Mali

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Fund a Civilization. The next paid ability they use costs 2 Gold less.
- Go on a religious pilgrimage. (2 uses) (Costs 7 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you go on a pilgrimage, all non-Civilizations will be roleblocked.
- Passively generate 5 Gold each night. You lose 1 Gold for each visitor you receive.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value: “They were killed by a Malian Mandekalu.” (Factional Kill)
